document.full_text: elderly voters who turned against president barack obama's democrats last year for tampering with medicare are now threatening to punish republicans in 2012 elections over their plans to scale back the health care program for seniors.
document.title: seniors may swing 2012 vote on medicare revolt
lines_and_colors: elderly voters who turned against president barack obama's democrats last year for tampering with medicare are now threatening to punish republicans in 2012 elections over their plans to scale back the health care program for seniors.
